content: a quick knit hat may be just the thing you need this wintry season scout features a simple diamond motif made in ultra wool chunky finished measurements approximately 17 /43 cm around x 11 /28 cm high unstretched berroco ultra wool chunky 145yrds/133m 3 5oz/100g #43118 marjoram - 1 ball 16 /40 cm circular needle size us10½/6 5 mm 1 set double-pointed needles size us10½/6 5 mm gauge 16 sts x 22 rnds = 4 /10cm in pattern stitch
